attributes.action: Make Dominic Raab leader of the conservative party.
attributes.background: Dominic Raab: Leadership fights often throw up unexpected names and could the 42-year-old be the surprise package of the contest. The justice minister and former solicitor is media-friendly and was a key figure behind the scenes in the Leave campaign.

rejection.details: The leadership of the Conservative party is an internal matter to be decided by that party.
